call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - December 12th 2024

commitments.commitment: Publish reworked EAP proposal based on forum text this month
commitments.quote: hopefully this month if no surprises, but they always happen. So yeah, hope to publish EAP reworked EAP proposal based on the forum text

commitments.commitment: Make issues with bounty for sub-blocks development
commitments.quote: we'll check developers group today, so if there are guys willing to contribute, I will make issues with bounty and so on

commitments.commitment: Give a talk at local developer event
commitments.quote: on Saturday I'm giving a talk at some local events

commitments.commitment: Record video talk about property rights in programmable money for Italy event
commitments.quote: it will take place in Italy on December 21st and I'm recording video

commitments.commitment: Take rest for half a day on January 7th
commitments.quote: taking rest for half a day on 7th

open_questions.question: Need for more developers, particularly UI maintainer for Dexy
open_questions.context: Spectrum DEX pull request merged but need UI maintenance

open_questions.question: When to make spaces and zoom calls

reversals_or_updates.previous: Peer was expected to be approved by Ledger for integration
reversals_or_updates.update: Peer wasn't approved by Ledger despite being former Kudelsky security employee
reversals_or_updates.reason: Ledger team didn't get Kudelsky quality from former employees
reversals_or_updates.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Still finalizing version 6.0 with some issues discovered that need fixing
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Sigma Rust now supports deterministic signatures needed for Keystone integration
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Kudelsky did audits for Sigmanauts in 2019 for inbuilt wallets, cryptography, and proof of work aspects
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Hackathon results: Satergo came first place, Bruno got second, The Shark and Sigmanauts came third
key_facts.speaker: Armeanio

key_facts.fact: Sigmanauts mining pool hitting big boxes in terms of storage rent from four years in the past
key_facts.speaker: Armeanio

key_facts.fact: PGR submitted pull request for silver Oracle
key_facts.speaker: Armeanio
